channel.title: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
channel.description:
To start things out, please, no harsh comments on this thread. Thank you.
My uncle was murdered a few months ago, at a local Rite Aid. He was shot to death over an argument. He didn't deserve it, and neither did his family. My Aunt and two cousins are struggling financially, and we are all pitching in at Christmas time to help them out.
Below is a link to a donation website, to help them out. Anything would be nice. I don't expect much from this community to actually give total strangers money, I mean what community would? However, they need all they can get right now. It would mean the world.
[url=http://www.indiegogo.com/colorado1776]First Christmas after Father's Death | Indiegogo[/url]
Thanks.
Here's some links, just in case some of you don't believe this is true.
[url=http://hamptonroads.com/2012/08/linecutting-fight-prompted-fatal-rite-aid-shooting]Line-cutting fight prompted fatal Rite Aid shooting | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com[/url] [url=http://hamptonroads.com/2012/08/one-dead-after-shooting-inside-norfolk-rite-aid]One dead after shooting inside Norfolk Rite Aid | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SZxTRdD3xao]One dead after Rite Aid shooting in Norfolk - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.wavy.com/dpp/news/local_news/norfolk/norfolk-rite-aid-shooting]One dead in Rite Aid shooting | WAVY.com | Norfolk, Va.[/url] [url=http://wtkr.com/2012/08/17/suspect-arrested-in-norfolk-rite-aid-shooting-accused-victim-of-jumping-ahead-in-line/]Man arrested in Norfolk Rite Aid shooting; accused victim of jumping ahead in line | WTKR.com[/url]

item.title: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Something like this happened in my family not to long ago. My dad’s aunt died (when she was alive, no one cared about her) and everyone was mourning. I figured out those people just wanted her money

I would if I could.

Read full topic
item.source: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins

@bowserjr2 wrote:

Sorry, but I do not believe in this form of charity.

Read full topic

item.title: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Was reading this than I realized I’ve read it before. Saw this thread on reddit a few days ago: http://www.reddit.com/r/Assistance/comments/14dzq0/father_of_4_where_to_find_help_for_christmas/

Person says their from the Virginia area, links from your thread are in the same place.

Whats your connection? Are you one of the sons of the father/mother who is requesting help?

Read full topic
item.source: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins

item.title: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

I’m sorry I cannot donate. Merry Christmas to you and your family. Sorry for your loss bud.

Edit: The link says your uncle was a Sheriff if I read that right, respect.

Oh and Muroth, I lost my uncle about a month ago, we were real close… if you need anybody to talk to, dont hesitate to private message me buddy.

Read full topic

item.title: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Members of this community will naturally assume this is some type of cruel ruse to raise funds for a Server.

Yes, and i’m going to ignore those. My family is asking everybody we know, I figured I would atleast attempt the MSCP community. This isn’t some cheap excuse for a VPS, or a website. I don’t even do RSPS anymore, I only go on here for the general category whenever i’m bored.

Read full topic
item.source: Financial Struggle for my Aunt and my cousins
